scripts.html: mkdir public/music-for-business && cp index.html public/index.html && cp music-for-business/index.html public/music-for-business/index.html && cp 404.html public/404.html
scripts.assets: cp CNAME public/CNAME && cp site.webmanifest public/site.webmanifest && cp -R assets/ public/assets/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run html && npm run assets && rollup --config && touch public/.nojekyll
scripts.publish-gh-pages: npm run build && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
